returns._0: bytes32 value of the ens setter role.
bytes32 value of the staking config setter role.
bytes32 value of the staking info setter role.
bytes32 value of the staking stat setter admin role.
bytes32 value of the stat setter role.
bytes32 value of the swap pool setter role.

params._amount: The amount of $RARE that has been unstaked.
params._stakedOn: The user who was being staked on.

returns._0: address Address of $RARE (the staking token to be used).
Info struct containing name, symbol, staking address, and reward accumulator address.
address of the swap pool associated with the token.
uint256 Amount of rare the user is staking.

params._user: Address of the user being staked on.

returns._0: uint256 Amount of rare being staked on the user.

params._stakingAddrs: Addresses of staking contracts being queried.

params._amount: The amount of $RARE that has been staked.
params._stakedOn: The user who is being staked on.

params._payee: Address of the account to be the new default payee.

params._rewardSwapAddress: Address of the reward swap contract.
params._stakingAddress: Address of the staking pool contract.
params._user: Address of the target whose staking address is being set.

params._from: Address to transfer the tokens from.
params._to: Address to transfer the tokens to.

ENS_SETTER_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the role used for updating the ENS resolvers.

STAKING_CONFIG_SETTER_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the role used for period length, deflationary percentages, and the default payee.

STAKING_INFO_SETTER_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the role used for setting the staking address of a user.

STAKING_STAT_SETTER_ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the admin role for granting the ability to set amount staked for a single user/total amount staked on a user.

STAKING_STAT_SETTER_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the role used for updating the amount being staked on a user/amount a user is staking globally.

SWAP_POOL_SETTER_ROLE().notice: Bytes32 representation of the role used for updating uniswap pools.

decreaseAmountStaked(address,address,uin.notice: Decrease the amount staked when a user unstakes.

getDefaultPayee().notice: Get the address for sending rewards if there are no stakers.

getRewardAccumulatorAddressForUser(addre.notice: Retrieves the reward accumulator address for a given user.

getStakingAddressForUser(address).notice: Retrieves the staking address for a given user.

getStakingInfoForUser(address).notice: Retrieves the staking info for a given user.

getSwapPool(address).notice: Get the swap pool address for the ERC20 token.

getTotalAmountStakedByUser(address).notice: Retrieves the total amount of rare staked by a given user.

getTotalAmountStakedOnUser(address).notice: Retrieves the total amount of rare being staked on a given user.

getUsersForStakingAddresses(address[]).notice: Query the users for the following staking addresseses.

getWethAddress().notice: Retrieve the address of Wrapped Ethereum.

increaseAmountStaked(address,address,uin.notice: Increase amount staked when a user stakes.

setDiscountPercentage(uint256).notice: Set the reward swap discount percentage.

setPeriodLength(uint256).notice: Set the round period length time.

setReverseRegistrar(address).notice: Set the ENS reverse registrar address.

setStakingAddresses(address,address,addr.notice: Set staking addresses for a target.

setSwapPool(address,address).notice: Set the uniswap pool address for the given ERC20 token.

transferRareFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Pools to transfer $RARE tokens, usually into pools. This is so users only need to approve the registry when staking or performing reward swaps.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted via {setDefaultPayee} when the defaultPayee is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setDeflationaryPercentage} when the deflationaryPercentage is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setDiscountPercentage} when the discountedPercent is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setPeriodLength} when the periodLength is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setReverseRegistrar} when the ENS reverse registrar is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setResolver} when the ENS resolver is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setSwapPool} when a new swap pool has been set.
@notice Emitted when guarded functions are called by users without the necessary permissions.
@notice Emitted via {setSwapPool} if the pool doesn't match the token and pairs with WETH.
@notice Emitted via {setStakingAddress} if the user already has a staking address.
@notice Emitted when Zero address provided where it is not allowed.
@notice Error emitted in {transferRareFrom} when a user performs an action that requires moving $RARE but has not made enough allowance for the registry.
@notice Emitted when a percentage is beyond the specified limit.
@notice Emitted when a Period Length is beyond the specified limit.
@notice Emitted when renouncing the admin role and no other account has the role.

@notice Set the round period length time.
 @param _periodLength The new period start.
